data: Recipes are setup in JSON files under the `behavior_packs/'name of pack'/recipes` directory. Recipe JSON files have different structures dependent on their type.

data.Description: Represents a recipe for use with a Furnace.
Represents a recipe that requires a dedicated pattern when using a Crafting Table.
Represents a recipe that does not require a dedicated pattern.
Represents a recipe that for use with a Potion Brewing station.
